name: WebreachTechnologies pvt ltd
overview:
Web Reach Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is a rapidly growing software services and solutions company operating in India.

Web Reach Tech specialize in recognizing client needs and nurturing an on-going relationship throughout the life cycle of the project. Our team consists of multi-disciplinary talent, a right blend of the skills and experience. The technical staff regularly updates itself on a range of programming languages, databases and application development tools. Web Reach Tech solutions’ are therefore high impact solutions and these result in not just improved productivity.

Web Reach Tech has set for itself the target of providing its customers, the cost benefit of an outsourcing company with the flexibility, efficiency and security of an in house IT department. We will design and develop an aesthetically pleasing and functional website/software that will be developed with the latest W3C and XHTML 1.0 standards and will be optimized for best SEO results and will be compatible with IE, Firefox, Opera, Chrome (All in latest versions).
